meta.label: Agent to Agent
meta.description: Connect to external agents using Vertex AI or API Token authentication

params.name: auth_type
params.label: Authentication Type
params.description: Select the type of A2A agent deployment

params.name: vertexai_connection
params.label: Vertex AI Connection
params.description: Vertex AI connection to use for authentication

params.name: reasoning_engine_id
params.label: Reasoning Engine Resource Name
params.description: Vertex AI Reasoning Engine resource name (e.g., projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOCATION/reasoningEngines/ENGINE_ID)

params.name: agent_base_url
params.label: Agent Base URL
params.description: Base URL of the A2A server (e.g., https://your-server.com). The agent card will be resolved from .well-known/agent-card.json

params.name: api_token
params.label: API Token
params.description: API token for authentication with the A2A server
